website_summaries.verdict: A small, silver, countertop dishwasher that is designed for a quick and effortless hook up in most kitchens.
pros: SPT's Energy Star-rated model has 6 different cycles to choose from: heavy, normal, ECO, glass, speed, and rinse
There is a minimum of controls and the convenient LED display lets you track the remaining time or the current running state
cons: As may be expected with the compact size, if you have a larger set of dishes, they might not fit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have the counter space
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s perfect for one or two people. Very quiet and does a great job of cleaning. Very easy hookup and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: James W Crawford

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do. Very quiet and gets dishes clean. It is perfect for a small kitchen. I wouldn't recommend it for anyone with more than 2 or 3 people living at the residence as it is a very limited capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Good dishwasher. Seems to clean better than a normal ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a couple of weeks. Good dishwasher. Seems to clean better than a normal dishwasher. It is also quieter than other dishwashers. Easy to hook up. Very helpful instructions/hints. Pretty easy overall. Has a cool timer countdown that tells you when it will be finished, like a washer/dryer. I'm happy. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Turned it on for the first time. Ran about 2 minutes then got error code E4, which is an overflow. Tipped over and dumped out water, sponged inside to soak up water. Checked all connections. Rinsed and repeated. Taped all hose connections, disconnected and reconnected all hoses. Checked the connection at the faucet adapter. Rinsed, repeated. Doesn't matter what I do, it runs for a couple of minutes then errors out with E4. I don't think it's strong enough to pump out the water and/or there's something already wrong with it. Either that, or I'll have to elevate it 4 feet above the sink to get gravity's help. This thing is a piece of crap. Avoid like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: safelykept

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeded expectations. Hook up was easy, no adapters are needed. It works for both male and female hook ups. It's super quiet. The only real noise are the few times it lets water out. It does not dry the dishes which is fine but it gets them squeaky clean. I was nervous with some of the reviews but it totally surprised me how awesome this little machine is. Fits enough in there for what I need. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: missjess0581

customer_reviews.title: Damage on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Dented.... cheap material.... finally open box after purchasing in July 2020.. I should have opened it right away. I am so upset WTF there is no back panel. The back is black cardboard!,,,,,
customer_reviews.author: ying

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even last 2 cycles...
customer_reviews.text: On second use (on heavy setting) got a code E4, and water was dripping from bottom. Dishes weren’t even heavily soiled, as there was little to nothing in the filter. Sucks that I went through the trouble of raising a tall cabinet 2” to accommodate the size.
customer_reviews.author: James Troup

customer_reviews.title: Great washer for one to two people.
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher has worked great so far. Little less room than I really need. But is exactly as advertised and does a great job. Large pans need to be washed by hand only because one or two would take up most of the room inside. Does a great job washing the dishes. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C. Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this dishwasher is great! Set up was incredibly easy and it works like a charm. I have a small apartment and it is a lifesaver. It fits perfectly under my cabinet and connects easily to the kitchen faucet. It does a great job at cleaning and fits a lot more than you think it does!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: No more dish debt!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! It seems a bit bigger in person than it does online (yeah, I did read the dimensions). However, I can say that the space it takes up is a fair price to pay for it's usefulness. Our sinks are finally empty, finally no more dish debt!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Weremeichik

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS THING
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up, a kid could do it; easy to use; quiet; does a great job of cleaning the dishes. So happy I bought it. Let's see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: littlecat_z

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It works really good. The only problem I have had, is fitting my full size plates in it. I have found a way to angle them in once the rack is pushed in otherwise it won’t go in because the plates are too tall.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Berg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Easy assembly. Works PERFECTLY. Super quiet and super efficient.
customer_reviews.author: DB McCrea

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! No leaks, sparkling clean dishes. Didn't take much extra effort to hook into drain and water lines under the sink to replace the faucet mount.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price - may need a new faucet adapter
customer_reviews.text: Update: with an updated part from a local hardware store, this seems to function and so far it has worked well. The only concern is the noise and the limited space. Faucet adapter didn't work with masco a112.18.1m faucet.
customer_reviews.author: rohs

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this product. I am single and this really helps out keeping my dishes caught up and out of the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Hall

customer_reviews.title: Easy of use !
customer_reviews.text: Use it camping works really great , hubby loves loading and unloading it , I cook he cleans .. men and their toys ... LOL
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Great dish Washer
customer_reviews.text: This washer works great. but it's small. We are two people, we cook everday from scratch. so you still have wash big pots{they take to much room). You can't jam pack washer, so it's takes some practice to maxium amount of dishes done. It does work great
customer_reviews.author: Skins Road Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: My apt has no installed dishwasher and not alot of room. This was a great solution. Works well. Doesn't take up a lot of space. Doesn't break the bank to buy or to use.
customer_reviews.author: erin macey

customer_reviews.title: This unit is absolutely amazing. Its great for if there are only 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit is absolutely amazing. Its great for if there are only 1 or 2 people that doesn't need a full dishwasher each day..
customer_reviews.author: United Federation

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love it! One of the best purchases that I've ever made!
customer_reviews.author: Cheria Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this dishwasher for nearly 2yrs now and it has yet to let us down!! We love it. We are a family of 6 and use it multiple times a day. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Skylla

customer_reviews.title: fits in my apartment and does a good job for such a small machine
customer_reviews.text: fits in my apartment and does a good job for such a small machine. By loose powder and don't add over suggested amount
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Countertop Dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: It's great quite compact it hold a setting of four.
customer_reviews.author: Abner H Reese

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this dishwasher. Although it does take a while (almost 2 hrs) for a standard wash. And it would be nice if it came with an aerator adapter to use on the quick connect fitting when not hooked up.
customer_reviews.author: Myles H.

customer_reviews.title: You just have to be smart and the way you organize the dishes
customer_reviews.text: I love this little dishwasher and so does my wife! because remember happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.author: Roger G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Larger dinner plates are an issue as they don't fit,my dinner plates are quit large
customer_reviews.author: whtfkdoing

customer_reviews.title: Love, but squeaky door within 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: Noise level isnt bad at all. Only noise really is water when draining. The issue i have is squeaky hinges and havent had it very long.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

product_meta.title: SPT SD-2225DS Compact Countertop Dishwasher/Delay Start-Energy Star Portable Dishwasher with Stainless Steel Interior and 6 Place Settings Rack Silverware Basket/Apartment Office Home Kitchen, Silver
product_meta.description: Style:DishwasherPerfect for apartments, office kitchens or any small-sized kitchens; offers full-size power in a compact design. With a height of only 17.24", this unit will fit between most countertop and cabinetry. Spacious cavity loads up to six standard place settings. Features automatic detergent and rinse-aid dispenser. Quick connect to most kitchen faucets eliminates the need for direct plumbing or permanent installation.
feature_bullets: 6 wash cycles: Heavy, normal, ECO, Glass, Speed and Rinse
Delay start for added convenience : Two, four, six or eight hours
Universal faucet adapter and Quick Connect: For quick and easy connection to most kitchen faucets
Electronic controls with LED display : LED displays remaining time or current running state
Water supply warning indicator and rinse aid warning indicator

specifications.Included Components: Dishwasher^drain hose^inlet hose^faucet adapter^quick connect^user manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars42 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
